name: YellowFeverTestsForYellowFeverVirusAntibodyQualitative
title: Yellow Fever (Tests for yellow fever virus Antibody [Qualitative])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Yellow Fever Virus Antibody (Qualitative)),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Yellow fever virus antibody (qualitative);
